Attributes.description: Written and oral communication in civil engineering. Business correspondence, business meetings, poster presentations, oral presentations and technical reports. Restricted to students in second year of the Civil Engineering program.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: One of APSC 176, ENGL 110, ENGL 111, ENGL 112, ENGL 120, ENGL 121, WRDS 150.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 1, Days: Mon, Start Time: 14:00, End Time: 15:00, Building: West, Room: Mall
